member.name: SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO
member.summary: The SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO structure stores information about an INF file's digital signature.

member.name: SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: Size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO.CatalogFile
member.summary: Path to the catalog file, stored in an array of maximum size MAX_PATH characters.

member.name: SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO.DigitalSigner
member.summary: Path to the digital signer of the file, stored in an array of maximum size MAX_PATH characters.

member.name: SP_INF_SIGNER_INFO.DigitalSignerVersion
member.summary: Version of the digital signer, stored in an array of size MAX_PATH characters.
